metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9746 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player version 32.0.0.433 (and earlier) are affected by an exploitable NULL pointer dereference vulnerability that could result in a crash and arbitrary code execution. Exploitation of this issue requires an attacker to insert malicious strings in an HTTP response that is by default delivered over TLS/SSL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 32.0.0.445ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 32.0.0.445ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '32.0.0.445ubuntu0.16.04.1').
